subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Didier Cuche, 36, of Switzerland became the oldest man to win a World Cup race when he won the downhill in Kitzbühel, Austria, Saturday.
snippet: Didier Cuche, 36, of Switzerland became the oldest man to win a World Cup race when he won the downhill in Kitzbühel, Austria, Saturday.
